Klasse Debug

java.lang.Object
de.ehealth.evek.api.util.Debug
public class Debug extends Object
Class to be used for Debugging Information
Autor:
ricow

    • setDebugMode

      public static void setDebugMode(boolean isDebug)
      sets the Debug- and Log-mode by the given arguments
      Parameter:
      arguments - - arguments that are given to the ProgramMain-main-method

    • isDebug

      public static boolean isDebug()
      Private Method to get, if the program is currently in Debug-mode
      Gibt zurück:
      boolean isDebugMode

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(String message)
      Method to send a debug message; Gets printed by debugMessageFinal
      Parameter:
      message - - the message to be printed

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(String message, boolean isLog)
      Method to send a debug message, also for Log-messages; Gets printed by debugMessageFinal
      Parameter:
      message - - the message to be printed
      isLog - - boolean, if the message is a Log-message

    • sendException

      public static void sendException(Throwable e)
      Method to send a debug message; Only for Exceptions
      Parameter:
      e - - the Exception to be printed
